snippet: The men spent 18 years in prison after being wrongfully convicted of raping and killing a 16-year-old girl on Long Island in 1984.
abstract: Federal jury awards John Restivo and Dennis Halstead $18 million each for wrongful conviction and sentencing by Nassau County for 1984 rape and murder of Theresa Fusco in Long Island; two men and John Kogut, who was also wrongfully convicted, had charges against them dismissed in 2003 due to DNA evidence.
lead_paragraph: The men spent 18 years in prison after being wrongfully convicted of raping and killing a 16-year-old girl on Long Island in 1984.

headline.main: 2 Men Get $18 Million Each in Wrongful Conviction Case
headline.print_headline: 2 Men Get $18 Million Each in Wrongful Conviction Case
